definition: relating to an equinox (when the lengths of night and day are equal), the great circle on the celestial sphere midway between the celestial poles
details:
adjective
- relating to an equinox (when the lengths of night and day are equal)
- relating to the vicinity of the equator
noun
- the great circle on the celestial sphere midway between the celestial poles
= synonyms: celestial equator, equinoctial circle, equinoctial line
